sys_properties_category.name: Portal Experience Annotation Properties
sys_properties_category.title:
The Portal Experience Scoped Application enables annotations on your Service Portal.

Attention: In general, annotations are vulnerable to JavaScript Code-Injection.
In the Standard / Classic UI it is the developer's obligation to protect against such injections.
In the Service Portal, the Portal Experience Scoped Application protects your Service Portal against this attacks by default.

If this behaviour is not desired, Escape HTML in Service Portal Annotations propertyÂ must be explicitly deactivated.
